snippet: After falling to a season-worst 12 games under .500 on Aug. 19, Milwaukee has regained hopes of returning to the playoffs — despite a loss to the Mets on Friday.
abstract: New York Mets defeat the Milwaukee Brewers, 7-3.
lead_paragraph: After falling to a season-worst 12 games under .500 on Aug. 19, Milwaukee has regained hopes of returning to the playoffs — despite a loss to the Mets on Friday.

headline.seo: Milwaukee Brewers Stay in N.L. Wild-Card Hunt
headline.main: Mets Put Brewers’ Surge Into Wild-Card Picture on Pause
headline.print_headline: Mets Put Brewers’ Surge Into Wild-Card Picture on Pause
